text: In 2020, Acme Corp pledged to cut CO2 emissions 50% by 2030.
In 2024, Acme Corp reported emissions down only 5%.
Acme Corp achieved record revenue growth of 40% in 2024.
Acme Corp will eliminate all carbon emissions by 2035.
Acme Corp has not reduced carbon emissions significantly.
